name: Arcadian Sunrise
description:
An extraterrestrial farming sim tribute to ConcernedApe's Stardew Valley and The Yogscast. Currently a prototype in development with GameMakerStudio2. Audio has been removed from this demo for the time being.

[SPACE] - Interact (some interactions require an empty hand)

[WASD] - Move

[SHIFT] - Run

[F2] - Fullscreen
[F4] - Restart Game
[F5] - Force Quit
